name: Valentin Anicza
headline: I Build Things for the Web
about: I'm a developer with a passion for creating beautiful, functional, and accessible digital experiences. With a background in both design and engineering, I bridge the gap between creative vision and technical execution. I thrive on turning complex problems into elegant solutions and am always eager to learn new technologies.

experience.description: Led development of diverse projects spanning AI, web, and mobile applications, with expertise in cloud infrastructure and DevOps automation.

accomplishments.title: AI Storybook App
accomplishments.description: Worked on an interactive multimedia story generation system, integrated Stripe for subscription management, and implemented real-time AI content generation.

accomplishments.title: AI Customer Support Evaluation Tool
accomplishments.description: Built CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, implemented conversation analysis dashboard, and deployed scalable infrastructure on AWS.

accomplishments.title: Doctor Assist App
accomplishments.description: Worked on a mobile application that transcribes medical consultations into structured forms using AI. Implemented offline-first architecture, secured data storage, and optimized real-time transcription performance.

accomplishments.title: Self-Hosted Business Infrastructure
accomplishments.description: Designed and deployed internal infrastructure for CI/CD, monitoring, and documentation. Automated container orchestration and built a comprehensive observability stack.

accomplishments.title: Peerconcept.com - Corporate Website
accomplishments.description: Built modern corporate website with server-side rendering for optimal SEO performance. Integrated headless CMS and optimized Core Web Vitals.

accomplishments.title: OutSnapped Photo Booth Platform
accomplishments.description: Maintained and optimized a nationwide photo booth platform. Reduced load times by ~40% using Cloudflare CDN and enhanced SEO.

projects.name: PocketAI Boilerplate
projects.description: PocketBase + Rivet + React framework for generative AI applications.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Open to new opportunities, collaborations, and conversations about building web experiences.
contact.location: Timișoara, Romania , UTC+2 (Eastern European Summer Time - EEST)

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell me about your project or opportunity...
